definition: to boil/to roll/to take a hike/Get lost!
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive

sentences.english: A ball bearing had bounced off the submarine's hull.
sentences.chinese: 潛艇船身上崩掉了一個滾珠軸承。

sentences.english: The use of ball bearings and self-lubrication can prolong the life of the machine.
sentences.chinese: 使用滾珠軸承和自身潤滑能最大地延長機器壽命。

sentences.english: Our company deals in ball bearings.
sentences.chinese: 我們公司經營滾珠軸承。

sentences.english: Double row angular contact ball bearing .
sentences.chinese: 角面接觸雙排滾珠軸承。
採用無噪音密封滾珠軸承。

sentences.english: The arm shaft shaft and hook shaft are supported by ball bearings.
sentences.chinese: 上下軸用滾珠軸承支承，同步齒形帶傳動。

sentences.english: The principal axis is installed at the machine shell center of the duster by use of the ball bearing.
sentences.chinese: 主軸以滾珠軸承安裝在噴粉機的機殼中心。
